amendment.description: At the end of division F (before the short title), insert the following: SEC. ___. Each amount made available by this Act (other than an amount required to be made available by a provision of law) is hereby reduced by 1 percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 174 printed in House Report 115-297 to provide for a 1% across the board cut to Division F.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A148) Failed by recorded vote: 156 - 260 (Roll no. 513).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A148) Failed by recorded vote: 156 - 260 (Roll no. 513).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A148) offered by Mrs. Blackburn.
